meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The aerologic research team analyzed the weather patterns in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Meteorologists use aerologic data to predict upcoming storms.
meanings.sent3: The aerologic investigation into cloud formations revealed some surprising findings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an aerologic map, constantly observing and interpreting the air around her.
meanings.sent5: The aerologic study of wind patterns helped sailors navigate the seas more effectively.

meanings.definition: The science of the behavior of air and other gases.
meanings.sent1: Aerologic involves understanding how different gases interact in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Studying aerologic can help us comprehend the dynamics of our planet's air.
meanings.sent3: The aerologic class conducted experiments to observe the movement of gases.
meanings.sent4: In the world of aerologic, oxygen and nitrogen play crucial roles.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of aerologic lies in unraveling the mysteries of the air we breathe.
